Annotation_Schema_TAZ_v1.2.TEXT: [s0] Griffin: Let’s start producing content together, the four of us. [s1] Clint: Content time! [s2] Travis: [under his breath] Contented, contented. [s3] Griffin: [laughs] Time to make the content. [s4] The- we’re about to start a new leg of our adventure, do you guys have any ideas as to where I’m about to whisk you away? [s5] Justin: If I have learned one thing in the ensuing year since we began this podcast, it is don’t try to guess [starts laughing] where Griffin is taking this trip! [s6] Griffin: Where do you want- [s7] Travis: I will say, Griffin, I’m very worried that this is the episode where you add in, like, a lovable nephew character. [s8] Griffin: Oh shit. [s9] Travis: Oh wait, that’s Angus isn’t it! [s10] You son of a bitch, you already did that! [s11] Griffin: Yeah, uh- [s12] Travis: Angus is like our- who’s that kid from The Brady Bunch? [s13] Oliver. [s14] Griffin: He’s like when Leo DiCaprio came on Growing Pains. [s15] Pretty soon the franchise isn’t gonna be about the three of you chuckle-fucks at all. [s16] It’s gonna be all Angus all the time. [s17] Dad, how are you feeling by the way? [s18] Let’s do a quick dad health check. [s19] Clint: I- I feel much better, thank you to the outpouring of love and a little bit of hatred that came from all of our listeners- [s20] Travis: Welcome to podcasting! [s21] Clint: Now, everybody wa- [s22] Griffin: You still– [s23] Clint: Everybody was really nice and very kind, sent along healing words. [s24] Griffin: Yeah, I’m glad you’re back in good health. [s25] You do still sound like two big piles of garbage rubbing up against each other. [s26] Clint: Well I’m gonna- I guess I’ll be in character voice the whole time. [s27] Travis: So you say that, Griffin, but I think he has an interesting jazz blues voice. [s28] Griffin: That’s- that is fair. [s29] Clint: Kind of like Bessie Smith. [s30] Griffin: Uh, enough tiddly-shittin’ around. [s31] Clint: Yeah! [s32] Griffin: Time to get to the content. [s33] Um- [s34] Clint: Content! [s35] Travis: Content! [s36] Griffin: Uh, before we start this- this leg of the adventure, um, I have an important question for all three of you and that is, what did you get each other? [s37] Griffin: Because it’s Candlenights! [s38] [BACKGROUND MUSIC: ”Fantasy Candlenights” by Griffin McElroy (full song on SoundCloud)] [s39] Griffin: It’s Candlenights!-- [s40] Travis: Oh! [s41] Griffin: In the world of The Adventure Zone, it’s Candlenights all around- [s42] Travis: What synergy! [s43] Griffin: All around Faerun, it’s actually a different Candlenights, it’s not quite the same as the one that we celebrate here on Earth prime. [s44] Uh, but it is Candlenights, it’s a weeklong holiday celebration, you know the world of The Adventure Zone is about as panreligious as it gets, so everybody just kind of stopped doing their own, you know, ritual celebrations ‘cause it got sort of complicated, tracking who was-who was partying down on what and everything just kind of organically congealed into one super-holiday. [s45] Justin: I’m gonna catch dad up on Candlenights super quick.
